name: Taily
title: Valiant Knight Commander

uniqueWeapon.name: Rock of Perseverance, Prochika
effect: Increases own Max HP by 8%, and after taking DMG 50 times, becomes [Fury of da Shuti Tribe] state. Upon becoming [Fury of da Shuti Tribe] state, immediately dispels negative effects from self, gains immunity to CC, and increases DEF Penetration by 200 for 5 sec. This effect is irremovable, and taking DMG while [Fury of da Shuti Tribe] is active will not reactivate the effects of [Fury of da Shuti Tribe].

skills.dark: Gains immunity to CC for the duration of Skill.

profile.likes: Going out for a walk, Compliments, Doing a forward roll, Somebody's snack, Junk food (Especially a slice of Koko)
profile.dislikes: Garlic, Octopus legs, Rivals featured in the 'popular' page of the animal hybrid encyclopedia

background.story:
There exist many animal hybrids in the world, but even among those animal hybrids, the origin of the Shuti tribe is considered extraordinary.

It is told that once upon a time, a valiant canine used a stone of supernatural power to create a technique that allows one to transcend the limits of the physical body temporarily. That technique was passed down to several successors, and they gathered to form the 'Shuti' tribe.

They then promptly sanctified the stone that started it all, and called it the 'Lucky Stone.' They cherished the stone in their hearts, and whenever they would use the technique, they would even chant and shout the name 'Lucky Stone.'
But for some unknown reason, the Lucky Stone vanished without leaving a trace, and this caused the Shuti tribe to wander endlessly in search of the stone.
Even now, the Shuti tribe leads a nomadic lifestyle, moving from one place in another, to find the stone.

The recovery of the stone has become the long-cherished desire of the Shuti tribe.

Recently, the Shuti tribe was blessed with the advent of young Taily, a Valiant Knight Commander who has stepped up to represent her tribe, and fulfill their greatest wish.
When Taily managed to inscribe the strongest seal in history onto Prochika, the iconic hammer of the Shuti tribe, Taily rose to become the hero who will finally fulfill the long-lingering wish of the tribe.

Carrying the wish of her tribe on her shoulders, brave Taily sets off to find the Lucky Stone that is hiding out there in the world somewhere.

Though it should be noted that Taily's journey is often interrupted by all kinds of animal hybrids who want to sabotage her journey, and Taily often finds herself straying away from the main objective because of that.

itemIntroductions.weapon:
The hammer of the Shuti tribe which is given to the bravest warrior.
The legends say that the day the progenitor attained the truth from the Lucky Stone after a series of harsh training, he carved his meditation rock in a shape of his own footprint to commemorate the historical day.

After a long time had passed, his descendants noticed that there was enigmatic energy emitted from the meditation rock of the progenitor.
The descendants researched the rock for a great deal of time, and after countless trials and errors, they managed to transform the rock into a hammer.

The research was a great success.
Just as the descendants expected, the hammer proved to be extremely powerful, and synergized perfectly with the unique technique of the Shuti tribe.
It was the birth of the legendary weapon, Prochika.

However, they soon found themselves agonizing over a question...
Who would wield such an overwhelming weapon?

After undergoing many agonizing discussions, the members of the Shuti tribe decided to host a contest to find the one worthy of wielding the hammer. The contenders would charge their energy and engrave a footprint-shaped seal onto the hammer, and the one with the strongest seal would be the owner of the hammer.
It was deemed fair and just since once the engraved seal disappeared, the owner would then retire, and the Shuti tribe members would gather again to hold a new contest.
Young Taily won the latest contest by engraving the strongest footprint seal in history, and became the rightful owner of Prochika.

As a side note, there are many on-going discussions about the etymology of the name 'Prochika,' but it is widely accepted that it was the word which the Shuti ancestors used to describe their moments of enlightenment.
itemIntroductions.soul:
Even after becoming the wielder of Prochika, Taily swore something to herself every day.
Rather than relying on the power that her ancestors left behind, she vowed that she would become a great hero with just her strength alone.

To achieve that, not only did she need to search for the Lucky Stone, she also had to give her blood, sweat, and tears as the wielder of Prochika.
Sustaining the secret technique as long as she can, winning the staring contest, complimenting other animal hybrids... etc. 
Nothing was easy, but Taily did not give up.

Her prayers and hard work were finally paid off.
After the endless training, Taily was finally able to draw out the highest point of her strength!

When Taily charged her energy and struck down the earth with Prochika, it was that moment when Prochika felt Taily's aura was very similar to that of its first master.

Prochika, impressed with Taily's prowess, released the brilliant, blue light.
The light was a fragment of Prochika's memory and also the form of the ideal hero that Taily has always dreamed of.

The hero with an overwhelming presence, intimidating gaze, and overpowering might!

- I have seen your blood, sweat, and tears, and I have to say that I am impressed!
You truly are the one who will succeed my will! Hahaha!
treasures:
The new issue of the World of Animal Hybrids is out now! To celebrate Puppy Day, we're featuring the Shuti tribe!
We have the Knight Commander herself who's eager to share the epic goal of her people! Her passionate interview has impressed us!
If you are someone who's always been curious about the brave Shuti tribe, then this issue is for you!
You can check out all the goodies just for 1,000 Gold!

A highly popular snack among the Shuti tribe, known for its blissful taste. The members of the Shuti tribe keep them and eat them only when they are famished.
It seems that a certain individual makes these snacks and gives it away to any Shuti tribe they come across.
The Shuti folks would form a line to receive this snack, and once they get one, they quickly store it in their pocket and stand at the back of the line again.

A book considered magical by the Shuti tribe that contains several coordinates of hidden treasures.
Originally, the book was given to the ancestors of the Shuti tribe by Idrian, and the Shuti tribe have been safekeeping it until present.
The Shuti tribe, however, could not decipher the difficult clusters of unfathomable characters present in the book, and could only recognize the drawings.
The Shuti tribe managed to find some treasures with the coordinates, but unfortunately, none of them was the Lucky Stone. Still, it has been confirmed that the treasures do exist in the places of the coordinates.

The decoration awarded to Taily the day she became the Knight Commander of the Shuti tribe.
Taily was specially appointed as the High Knight Commander after winning the contest and becoming the wielder of Prochika.
With the decoration shining ever gloriously on her head, she marches on to find the Lucky Stone.
